findings.message: Component script is large (211 non-empty lines). This often indicates logic creep.
findings.suggestion: Move domain rules/orchestration into composables; keep only UI state and event wiring.

findings.message: Component script references a network/fetch client. Data fetching should be moved into composables/stores/services.
findings.suggestion: Extract to a composable (use*Query) or store/service and keep component as wiring + UI behavior.
